How to practice the interview questions

Seven Step Approach

Posted on July 27, 2018

When it comes to practicing interview questions, quality matters more than quantity. There are literally thousands of sample interview questions online for companies like Google, Microsoft, and Amazon. Don’t try to memorize the answers. It’s impossible and won’t help you anyway. [Read More]

How to crack the tech interview

Seven Step Approach

Posted on June 28, 2018

Interviews are supposed to be difficult. The norm is that you won’t know how to solve a question as soon as you hear it. You will struggle through it, get a bit of help from the interviewer, and arrive at a better solution than what you started with. [Read More]

How tech interview differ

Microsoft, Google, Facebook, Amazon, and Apple

Posted on May 24, 2018

For the most part, the top tech companies are far more similar than different. There really aren’t “Google interview questions” or “Microsoft interview questions.” Each interviewer decides on his or her own questions, and almost any question asked at one company would fit in just as well at any of...
